section.section: The Board may not approve a contract to construct or renovate a State correctional facility for the Department, if the construction or renovation will provide more than 3,400 beds in the Jessup area of Anne Arundel and Howard counties.

text.section: The limitation established under this section does not apply to a community adult rehabilitation center.
